item.description:
Sundays September 12, 19 and 26 from 9:30-11:00 a.m. Subhash will be running a Kriya philosophy and meditation class at A Higher Balance Healing Center. The Sunday morning schedule is in place of his Friday night schedule until further notice.
Subhash is a devoted student of Yogananda's Kriya path and studies with Roy Eugene Davis. Donations are appreciated. RSVP appreciated but walk-ins are fine. See www.csaboston.com for more information.
Topics are:
9/12: Learning to live in the present moment
9/19: experiencing abundance and prosperity
9/26: Identifying and removing obstacles to harmonious living

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Kriya philosophy and meditation with Subhash
